## Known Issue

âš ï¸ **Python 3.14 Compatibility**: PyTorch 2.9.1 cannot import with Python 3.14

**Workaround**: Use Python 3.10-3.12 for model conversion
```bash
brew install python@3.11
python3.11 scripts/convert_clip_to_coreml.py
```
